column4: gedit will not die.  'sudo kill -9 6277' does not kill the process.  Thoughts?
gedit won't die.  kill -9 fails to work.  Output (http://pastebin.com/S7NMt8FG).
I believe this is causing "suspend" problems randomly.  Since the process refuses to die.  Reboot the only option?  Seems... wrong.
